verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Holy Bible, Book divine, Precious treasure, thou art mine: Mine to tell me whence I came, Mine to teach me what I am;

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Mine to chide me when I rove, Mine to show a Savior's love, Mine thou art to guide and guard, Mine to punish or reward,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Mine to comfort in distress-- Suffering in this wilderness, Mine to show--by living faith-- Man can triumph over death,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Mine to tell of joys to come, And the rebel sinner's doom: O thou holy Book divine, Precious treasure, thou art mine.
